mapper.select: SELECT STUNO,NAME,GRADE,SUBSTR(ID,1,LENGTH(ID)-3) || '***' AS ID, SUBSTR(JUMIN,1,6) || '-' || SUBSTR(JUMIN,7,1) || '******' AS JUMIN fROM STU

SELECT S.ID, S.GRADE, S.STUNO, S.NAME, D2.DNAME AS DNAME1 , D.DNAME AS DNAME2, P.NAME AS PNAME FROM STU S INNER JOIN department D ON S.DEPTNO1 = D.DEPTNO INNER JOIN department D2 ON D.PART = D2.DEPTNO INNER JOIN professor P ON S.PROFNO = P.PROFNO WHERE STUNO = #{stuNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE STU SET NAME = #{name}, ID = #{id} ,GRADE = #{grade} WHERE STUNO = #{stuNo}
